sqlMap.select: SELECT G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ, G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_SE, G.PRT_FCLTY_NM, G.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD, G.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT, G.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_AR, G.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT, G.INFO, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB, G.FCLTS_MNG_NO , C.LOC , TO_CHAR(C.FCLTS_EXT) FCLTS_EXT , C.STRCT_FMT , TO_CHAR(C.UPSIDE_ALTUD) UPSIDE_ALTUD , TO_CHAR(C.UPSIDE_WD) UPSIDE_WD , TO_CHAR(C.BERTH_DPWT) BERTH_DPWT , TO_CHAR(C.PERM_WD) PERM_WD , TO_CHAR(C.APRON_WD) APRON_WD , C.APRON_PACK_KND , C.APRON_PACK_GRDNT , TO_CHAR(C.CSDHP_SHIP_SCL) CSDHP_SHIP_SCL , TO_CHAR(C.FROST_DMG_WGHT) FROST_DMG_WGHT , C.BASE_BTTM_SOIL , C.HNDL_FRGHT , TO_CHAR(C.PILE_CLBR) PILE_CLBR , TO_CHAR(C.PILE_EXT) PILE_EXT , TO_CHAR(C.PILE_QTY) PILE_QTY , C.SHEET_FILE_STNDRD , TO_CHAR(C.HYDRNT_QY) HYDRNT_QY , TO_CHAR(C.FIREPG_QY) FIREPG_QY , C.YARD_PACK_KND , TO_CHAR(C.YARD_AR) YARD_AR , C.FENDER_KND_CD , C.FENDER_PMNT_ITV , C.FENDER_FMT , C.MRPOST_STNDRD_1 , C.MRPOST_PMNT_ITV_1 , TO_CHAR(C.MRPOST_QY_1) MRPOST_QY_1 , C.MRPOST_PWR_1 , C.MRPOST_STNDRD_2 , C.MRPOST_PMNT_ITV_2 , TO_CHAR(C.MRPOST_QY_2) MRPOST_QY_2 , C.MRPOST_PWR_2 , TO_CHAR(C.BERTH) BERTH , C.STPL_HNDL_FRGHT , C.STPL_MOOR_SHIP , C.BEGIN_PT_LOC , C.END_PT_LOC , TO_CHAR(C.WD) WD , TO_CHAR(C.LT) LT , C.PACK_KND , TO_CHAR(C.PLAN_HEGH) PLAN_HEGH , C.WAVEMAIN_DIR , TO_CHAR(C.OUTER_SWAVE_SLP_RATE) OUTER_SWAVE_SLP_RATE , TO_CHAR(C.IN_SWAVE_SLP_RATE) IN_SWAVE_SLP_RATE , C.OUTER_SWAVE_COVER , C.IN_SWAVE_COVER , C.CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = C.CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CL_CD) CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN CVL_ENG_FCLTY_SPEC_F C ON G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = C.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1 AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe#

SELECT F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SJ , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , F.ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(F.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(F.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G, FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F F WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ
